QuestData.Title: Paving the Way
QuestData.Description: My orders are to accompany you south through the Dragonmaw Gates towards the entrance of Grim Batol. We're to clear a path so that the rest of the men can follow us up and secure the entrance.$B$BTranslation: kill everything that moves, and don't be ashamed if you have a good time doing it.$B$BThe boys are getting antsy. Let's go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 30 Twilight's Hammer cultists along Wyrm's Bend as you fight towards the entrance to Grim Batol.
